name: XOR (itch) (import-this)
description:
UPDATE 20/1/2017: Android app coming soon! :)

4 logic puzzle games, each with its own simple set of rules.

Follow them to convert all 0's to 1's.

XOR, XNOR, NAND, NOT
Can you solve all the puzzles quickly?

You can also play the standalone puzzles on my GitHub page.

If you like it, then sharing helps me a lot. Thank you for your support!
If there is anything you don't like, tell me in the community discussion below.

Hope you enjoy! :)
